subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: There is no way Moises Alou is going to be ready for the season opener, which will place Endy Chávez, Ángel Pagán or Brady Clark in left-field.
snippet: There is no way Moises Alou is going to be ready for the season opener, which will place Endy Chávez, Ángel Pagán or Brady Clark in left-field.
